name: LORIDANE - MQTT In
outputLabels: conditional output, acknowledgement and Class A Devices

name: LORIDANE - Save new devices
info:
Accepts two Inputs:
 - MQTT in listening to lora/gateway#
 - Inject node or similar that sends a
    msg.topic of "syncfrequency"
    if the gateway should listen to the standard frequency of 867MHz for 10 seconds at SF7

It then will add a configuration-file
to /home/pi/gateway/
for each new Node

It has 3 Outputs:

 1) Contains every (processed) message the MQTT In      receives in msg.data.
 2) Should be conected to
    "Load Configuration from Files", if that is wanted
 3) Received Raw MQTT on msg.payload
    and the configuration Data if new device binding is initiated via msg.topic = "syncfrequency"

name: Read incoming messages
gui show confirmed
func:
if(msg.data.pay == "+")return {topic:"Confirmed by:",payload:msg.data.node};
return;
